name: Johnny Onion The Game
description:
Well, don't know what even i have to say. Maked this game few years ago with unity tutorials to learn some coding, and completely forget about it. 

But now i want to use this scripts for my new game, and i've figure out, that the old first game can be able to play again, but on the web. 

Nothing to fancy, but i think its still cool to play, so please, share and enjoy - and share the joy =).
